meanings.sent1: The fabric felt hempier than the cotton one.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the hempier rope for the task.
meanings.sent3: The hempier shirt made him look like a walking plant!
meanings.sent4: The air in the room was thick and hempier than usual.
meanings.sent5: The hempier texture of the paper added a unique touch to the artwork.

meanings.sent1: This soap is hempier than the one we used before.
meanings.sent2: The hempier scent of the lotion lingered in the room.
meanings.sent3: She joked that his hempier hair resembled a wild bush.
meanings.sent4: The hempier taste of the bread surprised her taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The hempier color of the walls gave the room a cozy feel.
